channel.title: auxin transport on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in auxin transport on funPlantGenes

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: BAK1;bak4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb288130 Gene Symbol: BAK1 bak4 Gene Name: brassinosteroid insensitive1-associated receptor kinase 4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BG1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g07920 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0175800 Gene Symbol: BG1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BrYUC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g041530 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6a Gene Name: YUC6a protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA06g032880 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6b Gene Name: YUC6b protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09g005830 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6c Gene Name: YUC6c protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: Bv1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb241060 Gene Symbol: Bv1 Gene Name: brevis plant1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G030920;Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Disruption of the amino acid transporter CsAAP2 inhibits auxin-mediated root development in cucumber.

item.title: CsBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G020890 Gene Symbol: CsBRC1 Gene Name: cucumber BRANCHED1 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBRC1 inhibits axillary bud outgrowth by directly repressing the auxin efflux carrier CsPIN3 in cucumber.

item.title: CsDUO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g03470 Gene Symbol: CsDUO1 Gene Name: DUO POLLEN 1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The miR159a-DUO1 module regulates pollen development by modulating auxin biosynthesis and starch metabolism in citrus.

item.title: CsFUL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G039910 Gene Symbol: CsFUL1 Gene Name: FRUITFULL Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A Functional Allele of CsFUL1 Regulates Fruit Length through Repressing CsSUP and Inhibiting Auxin Transport in Cucumber.

item.title: CsGRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGRP1 Gene Name: cell wall glycine-rich protein 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Differential accumulation of the mRNA of the auxin-repressed gene CsGRP1 and the auxin-induced peg formation during gravimorphogenesis of cucumber seedlings.

item.title: CsSUP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G012410 Gene Symbol: CsSUP Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A Functional Allele of CsFUL1 Regulates Fruit Length through Repressing CsSUP and Inhibiting Auxin Transport in Cucumber.

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: CsWOX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G042780 Gene Symbol: CsWOX1 Gene Name: WUSCHEL-related homeobox1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: WUSCHEL-related homeobox1 (CsWOX1) regulates vein patterning and leaf size in Cucumis sativus.
